name: Python 3
updateContentCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo xargs apt install -y <packages.txt; [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt; pip3 install --user streamlit; echo '✅ Packages installed and Requirements met'; echo 'Setup flask...'; pip3 install --user flask; echo '✅ Flask is installed';

postAttachCommand.server: streamlit run app.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false & python3 flaskes.py
